item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: October 27, 2023 Today's Verse Philippians 2:9â€“11 [9] Therefore God has highly exalted him and bestowed on him the name that is above every name, [10] so that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, in heaven and on earth and under the earth, [11] and every tongue confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father. This Year's Memory Verse Review Isaiah 40:28 - Have you not known?
